summary: This is a letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to the Metropolitan Detention Center regarding the case against Ghislaine Maxwell. It provides the password for a drive containing discovery materials for her case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the defendant in the criminal case referenced (United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN)). The document pertains to discovery materials for her case.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: She is the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York who signed the letter transmitting the password for discovery materials.

locations: Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC), 80 29th Street, Brooklyn, NY 11232
keyFacts: The document is official correspondence from the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330).
It transmits the password for a drive containing discovery materials pertinent to Ghislaine Maxwell's case.
The document indicates ongoing legal proceedings and evidence handling in the Maxwell case as of May 2021.
